ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: E.M. thanks the HERUS Lab at the École polytechnique fédérale de Lausanne, the Swiss Mobiliar insurance company, the ENAC Exploratory Grant 2018 (Preparatory Funding Scheme) with the project entitled “Risk evaluation of mosquito-borne disease transmission through urban commutes pathways” and the “Healthy Cities Towards a One Health agenda for urban space” grant from the Habitat Research Center at EPFL for partially supporting this research. The authors thank all sponsors and partners of the MIT Senseable City Laboratory. The authors thank Prof. Alessandro Vespignani for the helpful suggestions regarding the epidemic model.
